013package org.apache.juneau.rest.guard;
014
015import java.text.*;
016import java.util.*;
017import java.util.stream.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
020
021/**
022 * {@link RestGuard} that uses role expressions to determine whether an authenticated user has access to a class or method.
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * The role expression supports the following constructs:
026 * <ul>
027 *    <li><js>"foo"</js> - Single arguments.
028 *    <li><js>"foo,bar,baz"</js> - Multiple OR'ed arguments.
029 *    <li><js>"foo | bar | bqz"</js> - Multiple OR'ed arguments, pipe syntax.
030 *    <li><js>"foo || bar || bqz"</js> - Multiple OR'ed arguments, Java-OR syntax.
031 *    <li><js>"fo*"</js> - Patterns including <js>'*'</js> and <js>'?'</js>.
032 *    <li><js>"fo* &amp; *oo"</js> - Multiple AND'ed arguments, ampersand syntax.
033 *    <li><js>"fo* &amp;&amp; *oo"</js> - Multiple AND'ed arguments, Java-AND syntax.
034 *    <li><js>"fo* || (*oo || bar)"</js> - Parenthesis.
035 * </ul>
036 *
037 * <ul class='notes'>
038 *    <li class='note'>AND operations take precedence over OR operations (as expected).
039 *    <li class='note'>Whitespace is ignored.
040 *    <li class='note'><jk>null</jk> or empty expressions always match as <jk>false</jk>.
041 * </ul>
042 *
043 * <ul class='seealso'>
044 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.Guards">Guards</a>
045 * </ul>
046 */
047public class RoleBasedRestGuard extends RestGuard {
048
049   private final Set<String> roles;
050   private final RoleMatcher roleMatcher;
051
052   /**
053    * Constructor.
054    *
055    * @param declaredRoles
056    *    List of possible declared roles.
057    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, we find the roles in the expression itself.
058    *    <br>This is only needed if you're using pattern matching in the expression.
059    * @param roleExpression
060    *    The role expression.
061    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk> or empty/blanks, the this guard will never pass.
062    * @throws ParseException Invalid role expression syntax.
063    */
064   public RoleBasedRestGuard(Set<String> declaredRoles, String roleExpression) throws ParseException {
065      roleMatcher = new RoleMatcher(roleExpression);
066      roles = new TreeSet<>(declaredRoles == null ? roleMatcher.getRolesInExpression() : declaredRoles);
067   }
068
069   @Override
070   public boolean isRequestAllowed(RestRequest req) {
071      Set<String> userRoles = roles.stream().filter(x -> req.isUserInRole(x)).collect(Collectors.toSet());
072      return roleMatcher.matches(userRoles);
073   }
074}
